item.description:
UPDATE: STARTING 30-45 MINUTES LATE -- 12:30 to 12:45 rather than noon--Sorry about that. See you all soon.

 

Swap themes:

1. Elements (earth, wind, fire, water)
2. Six-word short stories or memoirs--info will be posted on Message Board (under "Discussions" tab above)
3. Technique swap or third swap: Cards made from March jam session OR artist's choice.

Judy will lead us in some wax/watercolor resist techniques. Please bring any brushes you have that you like to use along with an old credit card or gift card (plastic kind). If you have watercolor paper and/or watercolor pigments, please bring those as well.

As always, supplies for use during the meetup will be made available and we appreciate anyone willing to share any supplies!
item.how_to_find_us: Use door toward rear of church, off parking lot

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ April 2013 Monthly Meetup in Natick--Saturday's Meetup is ON!
